name: Canaan Site Furnishings
overview:
Canaan Site Furnishings carries a message of beauty, durability and environmental friendliness to our customers.

Canaansf is the number one manufacturer of site furnishings in Canada and working directly with architects, designers, and planners. The quality and design of our outdoor furniture along with our professionalism has always been our signature. The highest quality will ensure your ongoing satisfaction.

We manufacturer commercial furniture such as park benches, picnic tables, trash containers, recycling units, bollards, bike racks, and planters, as much as you can see in our product list with thousands of styles, colors, and sizes. Our products designed for the commercial landscape industry, contractors, property management companies, educational & government institutions, banks, communities, parks, hospitals and hotels in both Canada and USA.

With our utmost respect for the environment, we use recycled plastic lumber and powder coated metal. Furniture industry is no longer just practical but enhances the natural beauty of any landscape.

Your concerns and satisfactions are always our first priority.

For more details, please contact us at 1-877-305-6638 or by E-mail info@canaansf.com

You are also very welcomed to visit our show room at 140 Bentley Street, Unit 3, Markham, ON L3R 3L2
